data.name: CancellationMailBody.Text
data.value:
Dear {Recipient},

The following reservation, scheduled for {StartDateTime|f} - {EndDateTime|t} {TimeZone} has been cancelled.

Reservation details:

Category:...{Category}
Name:.......{Name}
Email:......{Email}
Phone:......{Phone}
{CustomFields}
Comments:
{Description}

data.name: ConfirmationMailBody.Text
data.value:
Dear {Recipient},

The following reservation has been scheduled for:

{StartDateTime|f} - {EndDateTime|t} {TimeZone}

Reservation details:

Category:...{Category}
Name:.......{Name}
Email:......{Email}
Phone:......{Phone}
{CustomFields}
Comments:
{Description}
{if:RequireVerificationCode}

In order to protect your privacy, please use the following verification code when looking up this and other reservations scheduled using your email address: {VerificationCode}
{/if:RequireVerificationCode}

data.name: MailAttachment.Text

data.name: ModeratorMailBody.Text
data.value:
Dear {Recipient},

The following reservation has been scheduled/rescheduled and is awaiting your approval:

{StartDateTime|f} - {EndDateTime|t} {TimeZone}

Reservation details:

Category:...{Category}
Name:.......{Name}
Email:......{Email}
Phone:......{Phone}
{CustomFields}
Comments:
{Description}

Please follow the link below to moderate the reservation.

{Url}

data.name: ModeratorMailSubject.Text
data.value: A reservation has been scheduled and is awaiting your approval.

data.name: Approved.Text
data.value: The reservation has been approved. An email confirmation has been sent to the user and Notification List.

data.name: Declined.Text
data.value: The reservation has been denied. An email notification has been sent to the user.

data.name: PendingCancellationRefundMailBody.Text
data.value:
Dear {Recipient},

The following reservation has been cancelled and a refund of {Amount} is due:

{StartDateTime|f} - {EndDateTime|t} {TimeZone}

Reservation details:

Category:...{Category}
Name:.......{Name}
Email:......{Email}
Phone:......{Phone}
{CustomFields}
Comments:
{Description}

Please issue {Name} / {Email} a refund for the amount of {Amount}.

data.name: PendingCancellationRefundMailSubject.Text
data.value: A reservation has been cancelled and a refund is due.

data.name: PendingRescheduleRefundMailBody.Text
data.value:

data.name: PendingRescheduleRefundMailSubject.Text
data.value: A reservation has been rescheduled and a refund is due.

data.name: PendingDeclinationRefundMailBody.Text

data.name: PendingDeclinationRefundMailSubject.Text
data.value: A reservation has been declined and a refund is due.

data.name: VerificationCodeMailBody.Text
data.value:
You are receiving this email notification because you requested your verification code sent to your email address in order to View/Edit a Reservation.

Your verification code is: {VerificationCode}

If you feel you received this message in error, please ignore it and delete it immediately.

data.name: VerificationCodeWarning.Text
data.value: You have specified to Require Verification Code, but the "Reservation Confirmation" Email Template do not contain the {VerificationCode} token. Please navigate to the Settings page and modify it accordingly. Hint: you can reset it to its default value for a quicker resolution.

data.name: DuplicateReservationMailBody.Text
data.value: Dear {Recipient},%0A%0A====================>[Replace this line with your personalized message]<====================%0A%0AThe reservation in question is scheduled for:%0A%0A{StartDateTime|f} - {EndDateTime|t} {TimeZone}%0A%0AReservation details:%0A%0ACategory:...{Category}%0AName:.......{Name}%0AEmail:......{Email}%0APhone:......{Phone}

data.name: EmergencyRequestMailBody.Text
data.value:
Dear {Recipient},

The following emergency reservation request has been submitted and requires your attention:

Reservation details:

Category:...{Category}
Name:.......{Name}
Email:......{Email}
Phone:......{Phone}

Reason:
{Reason}

data.name: ConfirmDelete.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

data.name: ReminderSMS.Text
data.value: Reminder: You have an upcoming reservation scheduled for {StartDateTime|f} - {EndDateTime|t}

data.name: AuthorizeNetSIMReceiptLinkLabel.Text
data.value: Please click here for your receipt...
